trans-unit.source: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un oggetto che identifica un elemento di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
trans-unit.target: Derivata da <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifica un elemento di dati tramite un elenco ordinato di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elementi.

trans-unit.source: Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.
trans-unit.target: Derivata da <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifica un elemento di dati tramite un set di <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elementi.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Clone modificabile della copia completa di questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase" />.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> metodo crea una copia modificabile di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per praticità, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
trans-unit.target: Clonato <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> proprietà sarà `false` origine anche se questo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>del <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> è di proprietà `true.`

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: Quando si copiano le proprietà di dipendenza, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (anche se non possono risolvere) ma non la copia non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.
